ygData.subject: Re: third tinkering book
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you much for the hint you were given.  I ll try that as soon as I log in.  Why exactly do you think it s in Solusek s Eye?  What a horrid place to hide
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you much for the hint you were given. I'll try that as soon as
I log in. Why exactly do you think it's in Solusek's Eye? What a
horrid place to hide something like that. Tho, on second thought it's
not a bad idea. Keep the good stuff for the brave. As I understand
it there is a way to tailor snakeskin gear. I met someone who's
friend made some. Of course, that and the bait could be either lucky
finds or false alltogether.

---Russ Gresh <lordgrunk@...> wrote:
>
personally I think the book is in Solusek's eye, the tinkering
merchant has to be there for some reason.
>
> Fixer gnomish enchanter
>
